Title: Double-page Illuminated Incipit
Medium: ink and pigments on biscuit-colored laid paper
Description: This double-page illuminated incipit from Walters manuscript W.650 is decorated with a headpiece, cloud-bands, and a border with floral design.
Keywords: Islamic; Mughal; Persian; Book; Codex; Illumination; Illustration; Manuscript; Binding; India; Literature -- Poetry
Provenance: Henry Walters, Baltimore [date and mode of acquisition unknown]; Walters Art Museum, 1931, by bequest.
Creator: Amir Khusraw Dihlavi (died ca. 729 AH/AD 1328)
